message: Let's make a deal Bob, this offer won't last forever!
Alice, my turn. Let's be reasonable. This offer ensures a fairer outcome for both of us.
Bob, time is running out! Take this offer before it depreciates further for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer now, before inflation eats away even more of my share!
Bob, I'm offering you a lifeline here.  This is your last chance to get a reasonable share!
